events.title: Hello South Africa.
events.description: A young mind in a new world.

events.title: Graduation @16
events.description: A successful high-school career guarding 1st place through every year at 98%+, and the privilege of serving as head prefect.

events.title: Student becometh Master
events.description: An interesting experience teaching at high school at 17, yesterday's friends become students.

events.title: Beginning of University
events.description: Decided to study Computer Science and Applied Statistics.

events.title: Graduation with Distinction
events.description: Graduated with B.Sc. Applied Statistics and B.Sc. Honours in Computer Science. Enjoyable time learning about the world of data, statistics, and computer science.

events.title: To the World of Fintech
events.description: Spent 3.5 years with a fantastic team at Electrum Payments building distributed systems for digital goods and payments used by South Africa's top banks and retailers.

events.title: Onwards...
events.description: Learning variable technology that can shape the world.
